definition: Daxing district of Beijing, formerly Daxing county
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)

sentences.english: Last week the Beijing Daxing district people's court ruled in his favour.
sentences.chinese: 上週北京市大興區人民法院做出了支持他的判決。

sentences.english: I am lucky that my parents bought me a two-bedroom apartment in Daxing district.
sentences.chinese: 我很幸運父母爲我在大興區買了一個兩居室。
